context_bundle.summary: Chef infrastructure automation using Ruby DSL: cookbooks contain recipes (code) defining system configuration. Resources: package, service, file, template, execute. Chef client pulls from Chef server or runs standalone (chef-solo, chef-zero). Knife tool manages cookbooks/nodes. Test Kitchen for testing. InSpec for compliance. Attributes for configuration data. chef-client runs recipes.

onboarding.quick_start: Chef cookbook structure: cookbook_name/recipes/default.rb contains resources. Syntax: package 'nginx' do action :install end, service 'nginx' do action [:enable, :start] end, template '/etc/nginx/nginx.conf' do source 'nginx.conf.erb' notifies :reload, 'service[nginx]' end. Create cookbook: chef generate cookbook mycookbook. Test: kitchen test. Upload: knife cookbook upload mycookbook. Run: chef-client (pulls from server) or chef-solo -c solo.rb (standalone).
common_patterns: File: file '/etc/app.conf' do content 'config data' mode '0644' end
Template: template '/etc/nginx.conf' do source 'nginx.conf.erb' notifies :reload, 'service[nginx]' end
Execute: execute 'reload-config' do command '/usr/bin/reload.sh' action :run end
Generate cookbook: chef generate cookbook mycookbook
Knife: knife cookbook upload mycookbook, knife node list
Test Kitchen: kitchen converge, kitchen verify, kitchen test
